title: nirupamAnamaina
sahitya:
nirupamAnamaina nIdu kaTAkSambulEni nAdiyokka jIvanamA


anupallavi

  kanna taNDri talli anna tammululEka vinnapamu jEsina


caraNam 1    janana maraNamulEni nI caraNamulanu mrokki manasAra vEDina karuNale dEmayya
   2. dInamella dhanyamellatanujAdhe sukhamulayalA innakula jAtuni ghana karuna rEkapOte
   3. bhava bandanamulE cikkiNu onditinayO nIdu padAbja sukhamulimma kavi sadhashivanuta
